title: Acknowledgement-assembly-model  profile generated 2026-02-16 15:56:42.212668
description: This package contains the model that has been assembled from the contextual model. All classes with relations [1..1] or [0..1] have had their attributes integrated into their parent class.

Acknowledgement_MarketDocument.title: Acknowledgement_MarketDocument
Acknowledgement_MarketDocument.description: An electronic document that is used to acknowledge the reception of a document and to provide information concerning its basic validity.

mRID.description: The unique identification of the document being exchanged within a business process flow.

createdDateTime.description: The date and time of the creation of the document.

received_MarketDocument.createdDateTime.description:
The date and time of the creation of the document.

--- This information identifies the document that has been received. The information is extracted from the received document.

received_MarketDocument.mRID.description:
The unique identification of the document being exchanged within a business process flow.

--- This information identifies the document that has been received. The information is extracted from the received document.

received_MarketDocument.process.processT.description:
The identification of the nature of process that the document addresses.

--- This information identifies the document that has been received. The information is extracted from the received document.

received_MarketDocument.revisionNumber.description:
The identification of the version that distinguishes one evolution of a document from another.

--- This information identifies the document that has been received. The information is extracted from the received document.

received_MarketDocument.title.description:
The identification of the name of the file or the payload that has been transmitted.

--- This information identifies the document that has been received. The information is extracted from the received document.

received_MarketDocument.type.description:
The coded type of a document. The document type describes the principal characteristic of the document.


--- This information identifies the document that has been received. The information is extracted from the received document.

receiver_MarketParticipant.mRID.description:
The identification of a party in the energy market.

--- The identification of the party who is the recipient of the acknowledgement.
The recipient of the document is identified by a unique coded identification. This value should be the same as that found in the sender identification of the document being acknowledged. 
The MarketParticipant that receives the electronic document.

receiver_MarketParticipant.marketRole.ty.description:
The identification of the role played by a market player.


--- The identification of the party who is the recipient of the acknowledgement.
The recipient of the document is identified by a unique coded identification. This value should be the same as that found in the sender identification of the document being acknowledged. 
The MarketParticipant that receives the electronic document.

--- The role associated with a MarketParticipant.

sender_MarketParticipant.mRID.description:
The identification of a party in the energy market.

--- The identification of the party that is the originator of the acknowledgement. 
The originator of the acknowledgement is identified by a unique coded identification. This value should be the same as that found in the receiver identification of the document being acknowledged. 
The MarketParticipant that transmits the electronic document.

sender_MarketParticipant.marketRole.type.description:
The identification of the role played by a market player.


--- The identification of the party that is the originator of the acknowledgement. 
The originator of the acknowledgement is identified by a unique coded identification. This value should be the same as that found in the receiver identification of the document being acknowledged. 
The MarketParticipant that transmits the electronic document.

--- The role associated with a MarketParticipant.

Reason.description:
In case of a received document without error, only one Reason element is necessary to acknowledge it. However, if there are errors then there may be as many Reason elements as are necessary to describe any errors discovered in the received document.  
At least one reason element must appear associated with the header part of the document. 

The Reason associated with the electronic document header providing different motivations for the creation of the document.

InError_Period.description: The time interval that is associated with the received document and which contains error.

Rejected_TimeSeries.description: The time series in the received document that has been rejected during the initial validation process.

code.description: The motivation of an act in coded form.

text.description: The textual explanation corresponding to the reason code.

TimeSeries.title: TimeSeries
TimeSeries.description:
The TimeSeries stated as being in error.

A set of time-ordered quantities being exchanged in relation to a product.

mRID.description: A unique identification of the time series.

version.description: The identification of the version of the time series.

InError_Period.description: The time interval in a TimeSeries that is in error.

Reason.description:
If there are errors at the TimeSeries level as many Reason elements as necessary may be found at that level.

The reason information associated with a TimeSeries providing motivation information.

Time_Period.title: Time_Period
Time_Period.description: The identification of a time interval with errors. It should be noted that the relative position transmit in the original document will have been converted to an absolute time interval whenever errors occur at this level in the acknowledgement document.

timeInterval.description: The start and end date and time for a given interval.

Reason.description:
If there are errors at the Time_Period level as many Reason elements as necessary may be used. 
The reason information associated with a Time_Period providing motivation information.

ID_String.title: ID_String
ID_String.description:
A code to uniquely distinguish one occurrence of an entity from another.

In the ESMP context, the code is defined either by:
- an emitting company that provides an agreed identification unique within a business context such as capacity auction identification, market agreement identification, etc.
- a party (originator of the exchange) that provides a unique identification in the framework of a business exchange such as document identification, time series identification, bid identification, ...

ESMP_DateTime.title: ESMP_DateTime
ESMP_DateTime.description: In ESMP, the dateTime shall be expressed in UTC as YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ssZ.

PartyID_String.title: PartyID_String
PartyID_String.description:
The identification of an actor in the energy market.

In the ESMP context, it is an authorized issuing office that provides an agreed identification coding scheme for market participant identification.

MarketRoleKind_String.title: MarketRoleKind_String
MarketRoleKind_String.description: The identification of the role played by a party.

ESMPVersion_String.title: ESMPVersion_String
ESMPVersion_String.description:
In ESMP, the coded value is restricted to digits.

A code that distinguishes one evolution of an identified object from another. Information about a specific object may be sent several times, each transmission being identified by a different version number.

MessageKind_String.title: MessageKind_String
MessageKind_String.description: The coded type of a document.

ProcessKind_String.title: ProcessKind_String
ProcessKind_String.description: The coded identification of the nature of process.

PayloadId_String.title: PayloadId_String
PayloadId_String.description: The name of a file or the payload identification.

ReasonCode_String.title: ReasonCode_String
ReasonCode_String.description: The coded motivation of an act.

ReasonText_String.title: ReasonText_String
ReasonText_String.description: The textual explanation of an act as a string of characters.

YMDHM_DateTime.title: YMDHM_DateTime
YMDHM_DateTime.description: In ESMP, the date and time is expressed as "YYYY-MM-DDThh:mmZ", which conforms with ISO 8601 UTC time zone. This date and time is without the seconds.

value.description: The date and time as "YYYY-MM-DDThh:mmZ", which conforms with the ISO 8601 UTC time zone.

ESMP_DateTimeInterval.title: ESMP_DateTimeInterval
ESMP_DateTimeInterval.description: This datatype enables to express the start date and time, and the end date and time of a time interval with a specific pattern. This pattern is the YYYY-MM-DDThh:mmZ.

start.description: The start date and time of the interval with a minute resolution.

end.description: The end date and time of the interval with a minute resolution.
